items.sentence: Tom can play all of Beethoven's piano sonatas.
Nothing out of the ordinary happened that day.
As soon as Tom got off the train, he saw Mary.
Tom has a red jacket, and Mary has a blue one.
We're going to be working in Boston next year.
Why can't I remember my dreams in the morning?
I'm pretty sure I haven't done anything wrong.
It's no use pretending you can't speak French.
Some people believe black cats bring bad luck.
Nobody bought anything Tom was trying to sell.
